Package hebrewNER.hmm

Class Summary
Event Event holds 3 public variable: tag, part of speach and context.
HmmContextGenerator Context generator to be used by the event stream and the name finder.
HmmEventStream This event stream is used by TrainHmm for training hmm model from a file containig the training set.
HmmModel Holds a Hmm.
HmmNameFinder The Hmm name finder tags token using the statistical model read from a file.
NodeIndexer Class for indexing the nodes of the HMM.
TrainHmm A class for training HMM from a corpus in one training file.
